description: Well another summer has come and gone, with only the final remnants of the season left to enjoy. But Trystan Bull is determined to make the most out of these last few warm days, as he is lounging by the pool and sunning himself with leisure. Applying the tanning lotion for that golden look, he decides to go ahead and cover his whole body, just in case he decides to whip his dick out or something... Oh, what? He already did that and now he's jacking off on the outdoor recliner? You don't say. Well sit back and ride the wave; there's nothing else  you can do now.Enjoy!
title: The Tan Handy
